properties.address: Green Lane Centre, Whitby, North Yorkshire YO22 4EH
properties.description: Four volunteers open up the space and offer free drinks and biscuits. Food bank available. Please check with venue or Facebook page. Occasionally the session maybe cancelled in the school holidays.
properties.title: GLCC - A warm welcome

properties.address: Skinner Street, Whitby, North Yorkshire YO21 3AH
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 6th November 2023** **Open from 6/11/2023 Everyone is welcome! We have a pool table; table football; books and magazines along with a section of DVD's to watch
properties.title: Whitby Christian Fellowship

properties.description: Public Library and customer service centre. We have lots of seating and areas to sit quietly with a book, tables to work at, FREE Wifi we have an IT suite which library members can use for an hour a day for FREE (extra time is chargable) We have a hot drinks machine at Â£1 per cup and we sell flapjacks and sweets and do explore our sustainable gifts retail section. On Monday mornings we welcome our under 5s for story times or stay and play sessions between 9:30 and 11:30 in the junior room. Thursday afternoons 1-3 we have an adults craft session, bring your own project and sit with other crafters to share tips and ideas. We have family lego clubs twice a week, Tuesday 4:30-6:30 and Saturday 10:30-12:30pm. If you are interested in Volunteering at the library we have application forms available for our various volunteering positions.
properties.title: Whitby Library

properties.address: Windsor Terrace, Whitby, North Yorkshire YO21 1EY
properties.description: Library space with comfortable seating and browsing areas, computer usage, tables and chairs. Lift from street level to entrance and internal lift to 1st floor library space. Free membership for users.
properties.title: Whitby Library
